f68v3.description: Full ring-spoke-center structure with segmented center

paragraph_above.description: Currier A-like text block above diagram

center_top_clusters.description: 2 single-token areas at top of center, separated by drawn lines

center_bottom_cluster.description: Bottom center area with 3 lines of tokens, in single defined region

visual_notes: Center divided into 3 areas by drawn lines
Top 2 center areas: single token each
Bottom center area: 3 lines of tokens

f68v2.description: Single ring with spokes, illustration-heavy center
visual_notes: Center has illustration but no tokens
Spokes are sparse compared to f68v3

f68v1.description: Double ring with spokes, no paragraph, illustration-heavy

outer_rings.encoding: Line 1 = outer ring (38 tokens), Line 2 = second ring (38 tokens)

paragraph.description: NONE - no paragraph text on this folio

visual_notes: NO paragraph text above - unique among this foldout

transcript_encoding_notes.f68v3_uses: O (outer), I (inner), S (spoke), B (bottom center), L (label/top center), P (paragraph)
transcript_encoding_notes.f68v1_uses: C (2 lines = 2 rings), X (spokes only) - NO P placement
transcript_encoding_notes.placement_variation: Each folio uses different placement codes - no standardization

user_observations: f68v3: Center divided into 3 areas by drawn lines
f68v3: Top 2 center areas have single token each
f68v3: Bottom center area has 3 lines of tokens
f68v2: Single outer ring, spokes, center is illustration only
f68v1: NO paragraph text above diagram
f68v1: 2 outer rings, spokes, lots of illustration

oddities.description: Center divided into 3 areas by drawn lines, with different token counts

Each folio uses different placement codes for similar structures
